text: Geoffrey set himself to consider the movements of the Bentley. It had passed him at the temporary bridge over the Tartaro at a few minutes past ten on the previous night. He worked out the distance on the presumption that its route had been through Florence and Rome and then across Italy via Foggia to Barletta. It came to just over six hundred miles.
handwritten_text: Geoffrey set himself to consider the movements of the Bentley. It had passed him at the temporary bridge over the Tartaro at a few minutes past ten on the previous night. He worked out the distance on the presumption that its route had been through Florence and Rome and then across Italy via Foggia to Barletta. It came to just over six hundred miles.
